title: Quantum.Break.Update.1.Incl.Eye.Patch.Removal.Trainer
description:
How to use the trainer to remove the eye patch:
- Go to the "Trainer" folder and run "Quantum Break v1.5.0.0-1.6.0.0 Plus 11 Trainer.exe" BEFORE launching the game
- Once you are in the game, Num . will remove the eye patch
- This must be prefored everything you exit or close the game
Credits: thanks to FLiNG at 3DM

How to apply the new update:
- Open Windows PowerShell ISE with admin rights (UAC) - not just Powershell!
- Run: "Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted" , click "Yes for all"
- Run: "Remove-AppxPackage Microsoft.QuantumBreak_1.5.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe"
- Close Powershell ISE
- Rename your game folder to Microsoft.QuantumBreak_1.6.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe
- Copy files from the "Update" folder into the game folder and overwrite if asked
- Open Windows PowerShell ISE with admin rights (UAC) - again, not just Powershell!
- Run: "Set-ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted" , press "A", and press Enter
- Run: "cd C:PathtoMicrosoft.QuantumBreak_1.6.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe" (ex: "cd D:Microsoft.QuantumBreak_1.6.0.0_x64__8wekyb3d8bbwe")
- Run: "Add-AppxPackage -Register AppxManifest.xml"
- Using Windows search for Quantum Break and play.
Credits: thanks to Mysteri0 for the instructions!
